samtools_default_30.string_process:
process samtools_default_30 {
    tag "$bam_file"
    label 'low_memory'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/${task.process}/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    file(bam_file) from ch_input_0
    each file(reference) from ch_reference_0

    output:
    file "*.cra*"

    script:
    """
    ${params.pre_script}
    samtools view -T $reference -o ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram -O cram,version=3.0 $bam_file
    samtools index ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram
    ${params.post_script}
    """
  }

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

samtools_default_31.string_process:

    each file(reference) from ch_reference_1

    script:
    """
    ${params.pre_script}
    samtools view --threads $task.cpus -T $reference -o ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram -O cram,version=3.1 $bam_file
    samtools index ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram
    ${params.post_script}
    """
  }

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

samtools_normal_30.string_process:
process samtools_normal_30 {
    tag "$bam_file"
    label 'low_memory'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/${task.process}/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    file(bam_file) from ch_input_2
    each file(reference) from ch_reference_2

    output:
    file "*.cra*"

    script:
    """
    ${params.pre_script}
    samtools view --threads $task.cpus -T $reference -o ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram -O cram,version=3.0 --output-fmt-option seqs_per_slice=10000 $bam_file
    samtools index ${bam_file.simpleName}.cram
    ${params.post_script}
    """
  }
